final_mermaid_code:
graph TD
    A[Mortgage application received]
    B[CT1: Check financial coverage]
    C{XORGateway}
    D[CT2: Check property]
    E{XORGateway}
    F[AC: Accept mortgage application]
    G[AW: Reject mortgage application]
    H[Mortgage application accepted]
    I[Mortgage application rejected]

    A --> B
    B --> C
    C -->|80%| D
    C -->|20%| G
    D --> E
    E -->|70%| F
    E -->|30%| G
    F --> H
    G --> I
